name: Aquarium NEX
text: If you control a face-up "Aquaactress" monster: You can set 1 "Aqua Story" card from your Deck to your Spell/Trap Zone also that card can be activated this turn. You can only activate this effect of "Aquarium NEX" once per turn. If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can target 1 Aqua-Type monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Aqua-Type monsters.
